Name: Mini Golf Arena
About the game: Mini Golf Arena is an exciting multiplayer mini golf game for up to 24 players online. Compete with players from all over the world! Features: 7 Golf courses with 18 holes (126 holes total). Full ball customization (Hats, Trails, Models, Colors). Support Steam Workshop. Build & play custom maps together with your friends. Support up to 24 players online. Chat & voice chat support. Unique gaming experience.
